messages.body:
Special Offer Announcement
Hi everyone, I'm excited to announce a special promotion for my UI/UX Design Resource Pack! For every purchase of the standard pack ($45), you'll receive a bonus collection of premium icons. Existing customers will receive two bonus template sets. Check out the previews at https://designresources.example.com. Your support means a lot - we've had a slower month with only $250 in sales, so every purchase helps!

Hi there,

Thank you for sharing your promotion details. While it's great that you're offering special bonuses to your customers, I want to clarify that as a support representative, I can't help promote individual creator offerings. Instead, I'd recommend:

1. Using your existing mailing list to announce the promotion
2. Sharing it on your social media channels
3. Updating your product description to highlight the bonus offer
4. Utilizing our built-in creator tools to manage special offers

If you need help setting up any platform features or have questions about managing your store, I'm here to assist!

Best regards,
Michael

conversation.subject: UI/UX Design Resource Pack - Special Promotion Announcement
